guardian.title: Record New York City murder freeze hits 12 days as experts cite extreme cold
guardian.topComment: It is just too dang cold to murderate anyone.

guardian.title: Netanyahu trip to Congress provokes harsh reaction from US Jewish leaders
guardian.topComment: During the past six years Netanyahu has shattered Israel's image in the international community. His bullying and bluster have won him no friends as he leads his country towards isolation. Like Gaza this past summer, Bibi has scored another own goal ...
